alt: M.A. degree ceremony at the Sheldonian
caption: [The Sheldonian Theatre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheldonian_Theatre), an exquisite Grade I listed building situated in Oxfordâ€™s city centre, is the official ceremonial hall of the University of Oxford. Some of the ceremonial activities that take place in the Theatre include matriculation, graduation ceremonies, Encaenia and Congregation.
